name: David

projects.title: Spike: Veterinary Services and Pet Care
projects.description: Mobile application that acts as a comprehensive manager for veterinary clinics and care services of pets

projects.title: Share-Sphere: Web Forum
projects.description: Web-based forum designed to foster an enriching exchange of information and perspectives within virtual communities.

projects.title: JEMAS - Jewelry Management System
projects.description: Inventory and employee management system web application focused on the jewelry industry.

projects.title: Pick-em Everything
projects.description: Pick-em-Everything is a game developed with Pygame where the player must collect objects and avoid obstacles in different levels. The game includes a main menu, configuration options and a credits screen.

projects.title: BuggBlock
projects.description: BuggBlock is a personal blog-like platform where users can share their opinions on various technologies. Administrators can manage posts and users

aboutpara: I am a 20-year-old Software Engineering student at the University of Colima with a passion for crafting innovative web and mobile applications. I thrive on learning and adapting to emerging technologies, always seeking opportunities to enhance my skills and contribute to meaningful projects. My goal is to create efficient, user-focused solutions while continuously expanding my knowledge in the dynamic field of software development.
